title: SPE Chapter 02 - Styled: CSS Variables, Dark Mode & Toast Notifications
description:
Chapter 02 of Simple PHP Examples - building on Chapter 01 with external CSS, JavaScript, theme switching, and toast notifications.

This tutorial covers:
• Incremental updates from Chapter 01
• External CSS/JS shared across chapters
• CSS custom properties (variables) for theming
• prefers-color-scheme media query for dark mode
• Theme toggle with localStorage persistence
• Toast notification system (success/danger)
